title: Big GOP Names Stump For Local Candidates With Eye Toward 2016
teaser: Many national figures in the Republican Party have been trying to give GOP candidates a boost in competitive races â€” and potentially help their own future presidential ambitions. Renee Montagne checks in with NPR's Don Gonyea, who's been keeping tabs on who's out on the trail.
